citations.narrative:
There is an accumulation of thick dust on several inside surfaces of the kennel including shelving and food storage bins.
Excessive dust indicates that the kennel surfaces are not being cleaned as often as necessary and can increase risk of
contamination and disease. Ensure that all surfaces are cleaned often enough to prevent dust from building up into a thick
layer. Correct from 2/26/25 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(3) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
There is an accumulation of thick dust on several inside surfaces of the kennel including shelving and food storage bins. 
Excessive dust indicates that the kennel surfaces are not being cleaned as often as necessary and can increase risk of 
contamination and disease. Ensure that all surfaces are cleaned often enough to prevent dust from building up into a thick 
layer. Correct from 2/26/25 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
